text: Elections to Stevenage Council were held on 5 May 2011. One third of the council stood for election; the seats which were last contested in 2007. There were no changes from 2007. After the election, the composition of the council remained as: *Labour 27 *Conservative 9 *Liberal Democrat 3 ==Election result== ==Ward results== ===Bandley Hill=== Location of Bandley Hill ward ===Bedwell=== Location of Bedwell ward ===Chells=== Location of Chells ward ===Longmeadow=== Location of Longmeadow ward ===Manor=== Location of Manor ward ===Martins Wood=== Location of Martins Wood ward ===Old Town=== Location of Old Town ward ===Pin Green=== Location of Pin Green ward ===Roebuck=== Location of Roebuck ward ===Shephall=== Location of Shephall ward ===St Nicholas=== Location of St Nicholas ward ===Symonds Green=== Location of Symonds Green ward ===Woodfield=== Location of Woodfield ward ==References== * 2011 Category:2011 English local elections Category:2010s in Hertfordshire
title: 2011 Stevenage Borough Council election
